name: admin.conversations.unarchive
desc: Unarchive a public or private channel.

errors.channel_not_archived: The passed channel is not currently archived.
errors.channel_not_found: The value passed for `channel_id` was invalid.
errors.channel_type_not_supported: The value passed for `channel` was a DM, MPDM, or the 'general' channel
errors.could_not_unarchive_channel: The channel could not be unarchived.
errors.default_org_wide_channel: You can't unarchive a default org-wide channel.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The token provided doesn't have access to this method.
errors.missing_scope: The token provided doesn't have the required scopes.
errors.restricted_action: A workspace preference prevents the authenticated user from unarchiving.
